statements: UPDATE carbon_footprint_data SET carbon_intensity = 25.75 WHERE material_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001'

UPDATE carbon_footprint_data SET emission_amount = 300.25, measurement_date = '2022-01-15' WHERE supplier_id = 'e7d60668-70f4-4f59-b4a2-655c9ba9d51b' AND material_id = '265d9ed1-8e6e-4fd9-aac0-e856db1fb01b';
